Key Match Events: Caoimhín Kelleher gifted the ball to substitute Petros Mantalos in stoppage time to allow him to seal the win.
Petros Mantalos scores Greece’s second goal after Caoimhín Kelleher’s error.
Pre-Game Insights: Both teams paid tribute to Greece defender George Baldock following his death at the age of 31.
Post-Match Reflections: Victory maintained the Greeks’ 100% start to the competition and kept them three points clear of England at the top of Group B2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland defended stoutly for much of a hard-fought contest.
Others: The Georgios Karaiskakis Stadium fell silent before kick-off as both teams paid tribute to Greece defender George Baldock.
